Find quick answers to the most common qu: Find quick answers to the most common questions about biennial filings and our service.
What exactly is a Biennial Statement?: What exactly is a Biennial Statement?
A Biennial Statement is a mandatory lega: A Biennial Statement is a mandatory legal document that all corporations and Limited Liability Companies (LLCs) registered in New York State must file every two years. It's crucial for maintaining active status and good standing with the state.
What are the consequences if I fail to f: What are the consequences if I fail to file this statement?
Failure to submit your Biennial Statemen: Failure to submit your Biennial Statement can lead to severe repercussions, including the administrative dissolution of your business entity, loss of your 'good standing' status with the state, potential fines, and significant difficulties in conducting legal and financial transactions, such as banking or securing contracts.
How long does it typically take to proce: How long does it typically take to process the filing?
Once your complete filing has been succe: Once your complete filing has been successfully submitted through our service, you will receive an official confirmation and receipt directly to your provided email address within 48 business hours.
Is your service officially recognized or: Is your service officially recognized or affiliated with the state?
We are a reputable, private third-party: We are a reputable, private third-party filing service. We are fully authorized to prepare and submit all necessary documentation to the New York Department of State on your behalf, ensuring accuracy, compliance, and timely processing for your convenience.
What information do I need to provide to: What information do I need to provide to file my Biennial Statement?
You'll need to provide your business ent: You'll need to provide your business entity's exact legal name, DOS ID number, principal business address, and the names and addresses of all current officers/directors (for corporations) or members/managers (for LLCs).
Can I file my Biennial Statement directl: Can I file my Biennial Statement directly with the state?
Yes, you can file directly with the New: Yes, you can file directly with the New York Department of State. However, using our service ensures your filing is error-free, includes all required information, and is submitted on time with confirmation of receipt.

what_is_biennial_statement_a: A Biennial Statement is a legal document that must be filed every two years with the New York Department of State by all corporations and limited liability companies (LLCs) formed or authorized to do business in New York. It confirms your business’s address, CEO, and other basic information.
is_filing_required_q: Is filing the Biennial Statement required?
is_filing_required_a: Yes. Filing is required by law under Section 408 of the Business Corporation Law and Section 301(e) of the Limited Liability Company Law. Failure to file can result in your business being listed as inactive or noncompliant in public records.
how_do_i_know_due_q: How do I know if my business is due to file?
how_do_i_know_due_a: If you received a mailed notice with a QR code from us, your business is listed in public records as past due or currently due for Biennial Statement filing. You can also check your business's filing history at the official NY Department of State website.
what_is_included_fee_q: What is included in the $125 service fee?
what_is_included_fee_a:
The $125 fee covers:
• Review and processing of your Biennial Statement
• Secure preparation and submission
• Email delivery of your official filing receipt
• Support and recordkeeping from our compliance team
certificate_good_standing_q: Can I request a Certificate of Good Standing?
certificate_good_standing_a: Yes. If your business is in compliance and up to date with filings, you may request an official Certificate of Good Standing for an additional $25. This document verifies that your business is legally authorized to operate in New York.
receive_certificate_by_mail_q: Will I receive an official certificate by mail?
receive_certificate_by_mail_a:
No. The official filing receipt will be delivered to your email address within 48 business hours of submission.
If you would like a printed copy mailed to you, you may request this for an additional $25.
after_submission_q: What happens after I submit my payment and form?
after_submission_a: We will review your submission and file your Biennial Statement. Once completed, we will email you the official receipt for your records.
contact_q: Who can I contact if I have questions?
